author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL FORECAST TO INTENSIFY LATER THIS WEEKEND... ...EXPECTED TO BE A HURRICANE NEAR LANDFALL IN TEXAS...
summary:
...BERYL FORECAST TO INTENSIFY LATER THIS WEEKEND... ...EXPECTED TO BE A HURRICANE NEAR LANDFALL IN TEXAS...
 As of 4:00 AM CDT Sat Jul 6
 the center of Beryl was located near 22.2, -91.3
 with movement WNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
